Class ApplianceDepartments

java.lang.Object
appliances.ApplianceDepartments
Direct Known Subclasses:
EntertainmentFactory, HomeCleaningFactory
public abstract class ApplianceDepartments extends Object
Abstract class representing an Appliance Department. It manages a collection of appliance types and allows dynamic selection of appliances or departments.

    Description

    Map for managing available appliance types within this department.

  • Field Details

    • applianceDepartmentMap

      public static Map<String,Supplier<ApplianceDepartments>> applianceDepartmentMap
      Static map for managing available appliance departments by their names. Maps department names to factory methods for creating department instances.

    • applianceMap

      protected Map<String,Supplier<Appliance>> applianceMap
      Map for managing available appliance types within this department. Maps appliance types to factory methods for creating appliance instances.

  • Constructor Details

    • ApplianceDepartments

      public ApplianceDepartments()

  • Method Details

    • selectAppliance

      public Appliance selectAppliance(String type)
      Selects an appliance from this department based on the type.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the appliance (case-insensitive)
      Returns:
      an instance of the selected appliance
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the appliance type is not recognized

    • selectApplianceDepartment

      public static ApplianceDepartments selectApplianceDepartment(String type)
      Selects an appliance department based on the department type.
      Parameters:
      type - the name of the department
      Returns:
      an instance of the selected appliance department
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the department type is not recognized

    • addType

      protected void addType(String type, Supplier<Appliance> creatorFunction)
      Adds a new appliance type to this department.
      Parameters:
      type - the name of the appliance type (case-insensitive)
      creatorFunction - a factory method to create instances of this appliance type

    • removeType

      protected void removeType(String type)
      Removes an appliance type from this department.
      Parameters:
      type - the name of the appliance type (case-insensitive)

    • listFactoryTypes

      public ArrayList<String> listFactoryTypes()
      Lists all available appliance department types.
      Returns:
      a list of department names

    • listAllApplianceTypes

      public ArrayList<String> listAllApplianceTypes()
      Lists all available appliance types within this department.
      Returns:
      a list of appliance type names

    • initializeApplianceTypes

      abstract void initializeApplianceTypes()
      Abstract method to initialize the appliance types for the department. Subclasses must implement this to define available appliance types.
